Willson jere ozi na US Air Force site n'afọ 1966 ruo afọ 1970, gụnyere ọtụtụ ọnwa dị ka onye ọrụ nchekwa agha na Vietnam
Ọ hapụrụ Air Force dịka Captain
O mechara bụrụ onye otu Vietnam Veterans Against the War na Veterans For Peace (Humboldt Bay Chapter 56, California, mgbe e mesịrị Portland, OR Chapter 72, na UK Chapter na England)
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Law School na Mahadum America dị na Washington, D.C., ọ ghọrọ onye otu District of Columbia Bar

Willson enweela ọrụ dịgasị iche iche gụnyere onye ndụmọdụ ntaramahụhụ, onye na-akwado ikike ndị mkpọrọ, onye ọrụ ugbo mmiri ara ehi, onye enyemaka iwu, onye nyocha ụtụ isi obodo na onye nyocha ụlọ, onye na'ahụ maka ndị agha, na obere onye ọchụnta ego.
Dịka onye ọka iwu na onye edemede a zụrụ azụ, o dekọrọ iwu US na ihe fọrọ nke nta ka ọ bụrụ mba iri abụọ na abụọ

Kemgbe afọ 1986, Willson amụọla iwu na ọtụtụ mba, n'etiti ha Nicaragua, El Salvador, Honduras, Panama, Brazil, Argentina, Mexico, Colombia, Ecuador, Cuba, Haiti, Iraq, Israel (na mpaghara Palestine), Japan, na Korea, ma North na South
N'idepụta usoro iwu nke ọ na-ekwu "mebiri iwu US na iwu mba ụwa na-amachibido ime ihe ike na mpụ agha," Willson abụwo onye nkuzi na onye na-eme ihe ike, na-akụzi banyere ihe ize ndụ nke iwu ndị a
O sonyere na ibu ọnụ ogologo oge, omume nke nnupụisi obodo na-enweghị ime ihe ike, na ịjụ ịtụ ụtụ isi yana ịdị mfe nke afọ ofufo.

Ọ bụ onye na-enyere ndị mkpọrọ aka na Massachusetts State Senator Jack Backman, jere ozi na ndị agha na-enweghị ebe obibi nke Gọvanọ Massachusetts Michael Dukakis na ndị agha Agent Orange, ma soro onye isi ala Massachusetts John Kerry rụọ ọrụ na Agent Orange na nsogbu ndị agha ndị ọzọ, mesịa ghọọ onye ọrụ afọ ofufo maka mkpọsa Senatorial US mbụ nke Kerry n'afọ 1984
Mgbe mmeri Kerry gasịrị, a họpụtara Willson na kọmitii ndụmọdụ ndị agha ya.
Willson bụ onye natara ọtụtụ onyinye maka ọrụ udo na ikpe ziri ezi ya, e nyekwara ya Peace Abbey Courage of Conscience Award na Kennedy Library and Museum na Septemba 26, afọ 1992.
